name: Tailor Shop Clothes Designer
description:
Does your kid want to be a fashion tailor in the Tailor Shop ? Does your little girl want to be the best seamstress ?
If your child want to play in the Tailor Shop Clothes Designer you have found the right educational game !
There are a lot of kids and they need the best clothes.
Please help the seamstress in this fun game for kids.

This app is a challenging and fun way to develop fine motor skills, visual perception and hand-eye coordination
in the world of Tailor Shop. The best app to be a seamstress or tailor and design various clothes for your customers.

Tailor Shop Clothes Designer is simple and fun :
* Choose the customer
* select the most suitable dress
* choose the fabric
* cut the fabric in the right spots
* stitch with the sewing machine
* decorate the dress with buttons and the best decorations
* iron the dress , now it's ready !
* go to the cash register and charge the customer
* serve all the customers in the shortest time possible
* You can also dress up the seamstress
* take a picture to the most beautiful clothes and share to friends

Run your own Tailor Shop! These cute kids are looking for new clothes!
If your toddler loves to play with Tailor games this is the best game for your child.

Tailor Shop Clothes Designer is a must have app for kids. Features:
-game for toddlers and kids from ages 2-13 years old
-Optimized for tablets (Sony , Samsung, Kindle)
-entertaining and educational game
-easy to use for children and preschoolers, babies, little boys and little girls
-simple and intuitive : just a few commands to use
-exercise your toddler fine motor skills
-Promotes problem-solving skills and hand-eye coordination
-many kinds of fabric
-a lot of accessories to decorate clothes
-a lot of clothes to design: skirts, trousers, sweaters, shirts, t-shirts
-dress up the seamstress
-all for free, without locked levels !

Help your kids to learn and inspire your toddler's creativity and imagination in the funniest Tailor Shop Clothes Designer !
Play with the best seamstress game, become the best seamstress in the world !
Having a beautiful dress is every kid dream in this Tailor game for free.
Now you are a dressmaker ! Let's design the most beautiful dresses.

Have fun with BATOKI ! Best Apps for TOddlers and KIds
